      • getAllSubscribers

        public HashSet<Subscriber> getAllSubscribers()
        Retrive a HashSet of all subscribers on the broker. This HashSet is a shallow clone of the internal data structure, preventing unintended modification.
        Returns:
        A HashSet of Subscriber objects that have subscribed on the broker

      • getAllPublishers

        public HashSet<Publisher> getAllPublishers()
        Retrieve a HashSet of all publishers on the broker. This HashSet is a shallow clone of the internal data structure, preventing unintended modification.
        Returns:
        A HashSet of Publisher objects that have registered on the broker
